pages.text: Highly Ordered Pyrolytic Graphite (HOP) is a complex, highly compressed, carbon material used in special engineering constructs. $(br)HOP Graphite Dust is created by compressing eight pieces of Coke Dust in the $(l:patchouli:heavy/squeezer)Industrial Squeezer$(). That dust can then be smelted into an ingot.

The most common use for HOP Graphite is the creation of electrodes to be used in the $(l:patchouli:heavy/arc_furnace)Arc Furnace$(). These electrodes are created with an Engineer's Blueprint, which you can find in certain chests or trade with a $(l:patchouli:overview/villagers#graphite)villager$(). $(br)You can also create electrodes in the metal press, using the rod mold on 4 HOP ingots, but the electrodes crafted this way have less durability.
